text: Alexander Valentino "Tino" Acebo (September 5, 1927 â€“ April 11, 2019) was an American Republican politician. For over 20 years, he was the Vermont State Auditor from 1970 to 1993. Acebo was born in Barre, Vermont. Acebo died in Wells, Maine on April 11, 2019 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Vermont Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Alexander V. Acebo
